text: Balistes vegai is an extinct species of triggerfish that lived during the Miocene. It was described in 2019 as a member of the genus Balistes. It is the largest species of Balistes and possibly the largest triggerfish to ever exist, being equal to or bigger than the largest triggerfish today, the Titan Triggerfish. == Related pages == * Balistes vetula * Balistes dubius == References == Category:Extinct fish Category:Tetraodontiformes
title: Balistes vegai
